god.name: Apollo
god.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker' space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

god.name: Artemis
god.description: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

god.name: Athena
god.description: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

god.name: Atlas
god.description: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

god.name: Chronus
god.description: You also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board.

god.name: Demeter
god.description: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

god.name: Hephaestus
god.description: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

god.name: Hestia
god.description: Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.

god.name: Minotaur
god.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards.

god.name: Pan
god.description: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

god.name: Poseidon
god.description: If your unmoved Worker is on the ground level, it may build up to three times.

god.name: Prometheus
god.description: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

god.name: Triton
god.description: Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.

god.name: Zeus
god.description: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
